name: Willem Jan Jaap: The king of the sea
name_original: Willem Jan Jaap: The king of the sea
description:
Willem Jan Jaap: The king of the sea is a  game made as a school project, the goal of the project was to make a game with a usable custom controller.

The game is also playable without our controller, It is also playable with a keyboard and mouse.

Controls:

look around - Mouse                                                                                                                                                Shoot - A

This game has been made by:

developers:

  • Lars Huiting
  • Gwen van der Woude
  • Merijn de Wit

Artist:

  • Cas Wijers
